description: A handmade 40mm grenade with a fungicide load.  It will burst in a cloud of toxic gas, deadly to fungus.
A 40 mm grenade bullet filled with fungicidal gas. For a while, we will keep releasing the sterilizing gas to the impact point.
It is a specially-made bullet that sprays the fungicidal gas sealed in the warhead when it lands. There is almost no killing power and the amount of glaze is modest to avoid warhead damage at launch.
